snippet: To understand the difference between the two nations look at their respective reactions to the problems surrounding the 2010 Commonwealth Games, hosted by India, and this summer's Olympic Games in London.
abstract: To understand the difference between the two nations look at their respective reactions to the problems surrounding the 2010 Commonwealth Games, hosted by India, and this summer's Olympic Games in London.

headline.main: Indian Insecurity vs. British Confidence: The Games Edition
